directions: Combine onion and lime juice in a small bowl. Season with salt and toss. Let sit, tossing occasionally, at least 20 minutes.
Just before serving, drain onion and toss with cilantro and sumac.
Onion can be pickled 3 days ahead. Cover and chill.
ingredients: 1 medium red onion, halved through root end, thinly sliced
1/4 cup cilantro leaves with tender stems, coarsely chopped
title: Lime-Pickled Red Onion
